#instructions for installing SfePy onto Windows

This page contains instructions for installing SfePy onto Windows.

*Pre-requisites:*

1. python(x,y) (http://www.pythonxy.com/)
   Download the latest python(x,y) windows installer.

2. pyparsing (http://sourceforge.net/projects/pyparsing)
   Download the latest pyparsing windows installer (Python version 2.6).

3. mysysgit (http://code.google.com/p/msysgit/)
   Download the latest mysysgit installer (get the file that begins with "msysGit-fullinstall").

4. Minimum 4 Gigabytes of free disk space, Due to the installed size of python(x,y) and msysgit.
